title: Tokyo Paralympics: Lee Pearson wins 12th gold as GB enjoy cycling and swimming success
description: Lee Pearson wins his 12th gold medal as Great Britain enjoy a successful day two at the Tokyo Paralympics

title: Majority of eligible people evacuated from Kabul - PM
description: Boris Johnson says British troops have evacuated about 15,000 people from the Afghan capital.

title: Champions League draw: When does it take place? Who has qualified? All you need to know
description: The draw for this the Champions League takes place on Thursday at 17:00 BST in Istanbul, as defending champions Chelsea await their fate.

title: Former England and Sussex captain Dexter dies aged 86
description: Former England captain and attacking batter Ted Dexter dies aged 86.

title: Stalin-era mass grave found in Ukraine
description: Thousands of people are thought to be buried at the site - one of the largest ever found in Ukraine.

title: England v India: Mohammed Shami bowls Rory Burns for 61
description: India's Mohammed Shami bowls England opener Rory Burns for 61 to end his 135-run first-wicket partnership with Haseeb Hameed on day two of the third Test at Headingley.

title: Food firm in 'drastic' action amid driver shortage
description: Wholesaler Country Range says it is buying smaller vans to get round the lack of HGV drivers.

title: Afghanistan: Plane leaving Luton to evacuate rescue animals and staff
description: The privately funded plane is due to collect Paul "Pen" Farthing along with staff and animals.

title: Lisa Shaw: Presenter's death due to complications of Covid vaccine
description: Lisa Shaw developed headaches shortly after being vaccinated against Covid-19.

title: Custard to be reinstated in Aberdeenshire after school petition
description: Aberdeenshire pupils took action to reinstate their favourite puddings, described as the "best in the world".

title: Mass brawl erupts in Armenian parliament: Third violent bout in just two days
description: Security personnel were called in to remove several members after violence erupted on the parliament floor.

title: Taylor Wessing Prize 2021: Shortlisted photographers revealed
description: The three shortlisted photographers for the prestigious Taylor Wessing Prize have been revealed.

title: Abba: Band teases major announcement ahead of new music
description: The band, who have not released new music for 39 years, reveal a new project called Abba Voyage.

title: Northern Ireland hospital waiting lists grow
description: The latest figures show that 348,867 people are now waiting for a first consultant appointment.

title: Sports Direct owner's new boss offered potential £100m bonus
description: Michael Murray, Mike Ashley's future son-in-law, must more than double the firm's share price.

title: GB's Kearney wins 100m freestyle gold in record time
description: Watch ParalympicsGB's Tully Kearney win gold in the women's S5 100m freestyle final in Tokyo, breaking her own world record.

title: Data protection 'shake-up' takes aim at cookie pop-ups
description: A new head has been appointed to the UK data regulator amid a plan to drive the economy using data.

title: Guardiola plans to leave Man City when contract expires in 2023
description: Pep Guardiola says he will leave Manchester City when his contract runs out in 2023 before managing a national team.

title: Covid: Jab preparation for 12 to 15-year-olds and vial shortages
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Thursday morning.

title: Frozen: Can the stage musical recreate the film's magic?
description: Some critics are sceptical, but London's Anna and Elsa say the stage adaptation will please fans.

title: Tokyo Paralympics: Britain's Ali Jawad says he has 'been in self-isolation for three years'
description: British powerlifter Ali Jawad says he has effectively self-isolated for three years to make it to the Paralympics.

title: John McAleese: The SAS soldier who was the man behind the mask
description: John McAleese was the Scots soldier watched by millions on live television in the Iranian Embassy raid.

description: The focus is on the latest efforts to evacuate Afghans, and the possibility of extending the Covid vaccine rollout to younger age groups.

title: Australian farmer draws heart with sheep in tribute to aunt
description: The Australian man was unable to attend his aunt's funeral because of Covid travel restrictions.

title: The English Riviera during the 2021 UK staycation
description: Photographer David Hares captures people enjoying the seaside during the staycation of 2021.
